all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And that which doth not edify is not of God, and is darkness.
Doctrine and Covenants 50:23
Quote of the Day
"“Whom seek ye?” With all our hearts we answer, “Jesus of Nazareth.”"
Jeffrey R. Holland | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
